author: Tom Breihan
title: Stream Grandaddy Last Place - Stereogum
text:
Tom Breihan @tombreihan | 9:19 am Share < br />this article: 
Grandaddy, the late-’90s/early-’00s Californian masters of lightly psychedelic tech-blues power-pop, released their last album 11 years ago. They’ve broken up and reunited , and now they’re back with their follow-up to 2006’s farewell Just Like The Fambly Cat . Next week, they’ll release the reunion album Last Place , and we’ve posted a few of its songs already: “ Way We Won’t ,”“ Clear Your History ,”“ A Lost Machine ,”“ Evermore .” And right now, you can stream the entire album below, via NPR . 
Last Place is out 3/3 on Danger Mouse’s 30th Century label.
